Connect with our team

Vectgen Bio is based in Research Triangle Park, NC, a hub of innovation in science and technology. RTP offers a robust biotechnology ecosystem, including access to leading academic medical centers, cutting-edge manufacturing infrastructure, and an incredible pool of local talent.
